name: Liviu Iancu
tagline: Collection of tutorials and projects made with HTML, CSS, JavaScript
body:
![](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LiviuLvu/LiviuLvu.github.io/master/images/frontcrash.jpg)

## Welcome to my GitHub Test Pages
Below is a list of selected web tutorials and personal learning projects made with javaScript and related frontend technologies.
Used on all projects: Sublime Text, NPM, Grunt.js, HTML,
Left side is the app name.
Right side shows the languages and libraries used to build the app.
Most recent projects on top.

## List of selected tutorials and small projects

* [Carousel Products Presentation](http://lvudesign.com/learning-carousel/)
    --- jquery, jquery.roundabout
* [Sortable Gallery page](http://lvudesign.com/learning-sortable-gallery/)
    --- jquery, jquery.fancybox, css rules with stylus
* [Timeline App](http://lvudesign.com/learning-timeline-jquery/)
    --- jquery, Stylus CSS
* [Live Search app](http://lvudesign.com/learning-live-search/)
    --- jquery, stylus.css
* [Create Books data app](http://lvudesign.com/learning-minimal-js-app/)
    --- CSS, plain javascript
* [From design concept to website, mobile friendly](http://lvudesign.com/test-agency/)
    --- grunt browser-sync, watch, stylus.css, flexbox, jquery
* [Mobile responsive .psd to HTMl conversion](http://lvudesign.com/test-responsive/)
    --- grunt browser-sync, watch, stylus.css, flexbox, jquery
* [One page website with smooth scroll](https://liviuLvu.github.io/Bootstrap3_onePage_tut2)
    --- CSS Bootstrap 3
* [One page website tutorial](https://liviuLvu.github.io/Bootstrap3_onePage_tut1)
    --- CSS Bootstrap 3
* [Map location pointers](https://liviuLvu.github.io/map_custom_directive)
    --- angular.js, leaflet.js
* [Outbox2](https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/outbox2)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Reader](https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/reader)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Calendar](https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/calendar)
    --- routing, angular.js, bootstrap, custom css
* [Front page](https://liviuLvu.github.io/codeacademy/airbnb_website)
    --- html, css, bootstrap
* [Button hides text](http://liviulvu.github.io/isolated_scope_directive/)
    --- angular.js, bootstrap
* [Movie list, sortable, with add function](http://liviulvu.github.io/movie_list_sortable_add/)
    --- angular.js
* [Menu Bar](http://liviulvu.github.io/nav_menu/)
    --- angular.js
* [Search functionality](http://liviulvu.github.io/search_simple_example/)
    --- angular.js
* [Form updates data displayed, reset form](http://liviulvu.github.io/form_update_data/)
    --- angular.js
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
